FuncDef: The command specifies to initiate a linktrace test.
CLIs: linktrace { <mac-address> | remote-mepid <mep-id> } mep <mep-id> domain <md-index> association <ma-index> [ ttl <ttl-value> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a unicast MAC address destination in the format xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx or xx-xx-xx-xx-xx-xx.

Specifies the remote MEP ID of the peer within the association. The domain and association information are derived from the source mep for the session. The Layer 2 IEEE MAC address is resolved from previously-learned remote MAC addressing, derived from the reception and processing of the ETH-CC PDU. The local MEP must be administratively enabled. Values-1 to 8191.
Specifies the local MEP ID. Values-1 to 8191.
Specifies the MD index. Values-1 to 4294967295.
Specifies the MA index. Values-1 to 4294967295.
Specifies the TTL for a returned linktrace. Values-0 to 255. ParamDefault: Default- 64
